title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Cannon on Lookout Mountain NPS  Looking to learn more about Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park and its units?  News Browse press releases and copies of the "Battlefield Dispatch" - the park's official newsletter.      Photos & Multimedia Check out the park's photo gallery and videos here!      History and Culture Learn about individuals who impacted the area through time and about different units of the national military park.      Education If you are interested in on-site or off-site programming, you can browse and choose the program that fits your students' needs.        Kids and Youth Learn how to become a junior ranger, a junior Civil War historian, search for youth camp opportunities, to receive Civil War to Civil Rights trading cards, or other suggestions for family focused activities within the park.
